com.ztman.tools.concurrent.threadpool

类 ThreadPoolBuilder.QueuableCachedThreadPoolBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ztman.tools.concurrent.threadpool.ThreadPoolBuilder.QueuableCachedThreadPoolBuilder
  • 封闭类:
    ThreadPoolBuilder

    public static class ThreadPoolBuilder.QueuableCachedThreadPoolBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    从Tomcat移植过来的可扩展可用Queue缓存任务的ThreadPool
    另请参阅:
    QueuableCachedThreadPool

      ThreadPoolBuilder.QueuableCachedThreadPoolBuilder setDaemon(java.lang.Boolean daemon)
      与threadFactory互斥, 优先使用ThreadFactory 默认为NULL，不进行设置，使用JDK的默认值.
